item.description:
What is The Levity Project?
It is a social movement with the mission of creating more lightheartedness in our world by engaging in public acts of joy, laughter and levity...(and yes, it is very fun!) in a flash mob style event.

What is a Flash Mob?
It is when a group of people"spontaneously" gather in a public place to create an event of some sort.

All of The Levity Project events focus on creating a sense of play,laughter, and celebration in our world. You can see some of our videos and events here on our website.

And The Levity Project is coming to Maine for The FIRST big Maine Flash Mob event. The event will be at the Yarmouth Clam Festival.

Details about what is happening at the event will only be given out to registrants.
(we promise it is a memorable experience for all!)

Why do it?
A. It is the first flash mob in Maine and that is kinda fun.
B. By coming together, it is a gift we offer a community of joy and celebration.
C. It is an excellent way to spend part of one's 15 minutes of fame...did we mention there will be 20,000 people there...yup. hahaha!

Please join and register using the link
http://thelevityproje...
The event is free for all who join in.

Please forward and invite to anyone you know who might want to join us...we would love to have 200-300 people.

Thank you and keep laughing,
Katie
PS you can email me at katie (AT) thelevityproject (dot) com and feel free to contact if you have a good source of people who might want to play with us. Thank you!

You can also call 207 239 8667 if you have questions. I would be happy to speak with you. :)
item.name: A Special Event: The Levity Project is coming to MAINE!
